TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FileSystemSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public MustInherit Class FileSystemSecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示檔案或目錄的存取控制 (Access Control) 和稽核安全性。

span.span: Represents the access control and audit security for a file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基底類別和類別。The class is the base class for the and classes. 這些類別代表所有的系統檔案或目錄的存取權限，並且定義嘗試存取稽核的方式。These classes represent all of the access rights for a system file or directory and define how access attempts are audited. 類別表示為一組規則的存取和稽核 」 權限。The class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules. 每個存取規則由物件，而每個稽核規則由物件。Each access rule is represented by a object, while each audit rule is represented by a object. 類別是抽象的基礎的 Microsoft Windows 檔案安全性系統。The class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system. 在此系統中，每個檔案或目錄已判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，以控制存取檔案或目錄和系統存取控制清單 (SACL)，其指定要稽核的存取控制嘗試。In this system, each file or directory has a discretionary access control list (DACL), which controls access to the file or directory, and a system access control list (SACL), which specifies the access control attempts that are audited. 和類別是抽象的構成 Dacl Sacl 的存取控制項目 (Ace)。The and classes are abstractions of access control entries (ACEs) that comprise DACLs and SACLs. 類別會隱藏許多 Dacl 和 Sacl 的詳細資料，則您不必擔心 ACE 排序或 null 的 DACL。The class hides many of details of DACLs and SACLs; you do not have to worry about ACE ordering or null DACLS. 若要保存至檔案的新增或變更的存取控制清單 (ACL) 資訊，請使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到目錄，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要從檔案擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要從目錄擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來新增，並從檔案中移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AccessRightType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 類別用來表示存取權限的列舉型別 (Enumeration)。

span.span: Gets the enumeration that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 物件，表示 列舉型別。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別覆寫屬性，並傳回它們以表示的存取權限的類型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷要用於每個安全性物件的正確的列舉類型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule AccessRuleFactory (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identityReference, int accessMask, bool isInherited, System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags inheritanceFlags, System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags propagationFlags, System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type);

param.name: identityReference
param.span: 物件，表示使用者帳戶。

span.span: An object that represents a user account.

param.name: accessMask
param.span: 整數，指定存取類型。

span.span: An integer that specifies an access type.

param.name: isInherited
param.span: 如果繼承存取規則，則為 ，否則為 。

param.span: 其中一個 值，指定存取遮罩要如何散佈到子物件。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how to propagate access masks to child objects.

param.name: propagationFlags
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定存取控制項目 (ACE) 要如何散佈到子物件。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how to propagate Access Control Entries (ACEs) to child objects.

param.name: type
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定允許還是拒絕存取。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether access is allowed or denied.

summary.span: 以指定的存取權限、存取控制和旗標，初始化 類別 (用於表示指定使用者的新存取控制規則) 的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that represents a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 新的 物件，以指定的存取權限、存取控制和旗標表示指定之使用者的新存取控制規則。

span.span: A new object that represents a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立存取控制規則的建議的方式是使用的建構函式類別。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. 傳回型別方法為基底類別， ，但傳回的值可以安全地轉換成衍生類別。The return type of the method is the base class, , but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.

exception.span: 、、 或 參數會指定無效值。

A object representing the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別覆寫屬性，並傳回它們以表示存取規則的類型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rules. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷用於每個安全性物件的正確的存取規則類型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct access rule type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 物件，表示要加入至檔案或目錄的存取控制清單 (ACL) 使用權限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to add to a file or directory.

summary.span: 將指定的存取控制清單 (ACL) 使用權限加入至目前的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Adds the specified access control list (ACL) permission to the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將新規則的規則包含在清單中加入物件。The method adds a new rule to the list of rules contained within a object. 如果指定的規則已存在的存取控制清單 (ACL)方法仍會加入規則，有一個例外狀況：使用建立物件列舉值會取代使用所建立的物件列舉值。If an access control list (ACL) already exists for the specified rule, the method will still add the rule, with one exception: a object created using the enumeration value supersedes an object created using the enumeration value. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到檔案，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到目錄，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要從檔案擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要從目錄擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 當您新增存取規則未設定旗標，旗標將會自動加入至您的規則。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果您移除規則稍後但未指定旗標，此旗標將會自動移除。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來新增，並從檔案中移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

param.name: rule
param.span: 物件，表示要新增至檔案或目錄的稽核規則。

span.span: A object that represents an audit rule to add to a file or directory.

summary.span: 將指定的稽核規則加入至目前的檔案或目錄。

span.span: Adds the specified audit rule to the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將新的稽核規則的規則包含在清單中加入物件。The method adds a new audit rule to the list of rules contained within a object. 如果稽核規則已經存在指定的規則，方法仍會加入規則。If an audit rule already exists for the specified rule, the method will still add the rule. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，將稽核規則加入至檔案，以及使用方法來移除檔案中的稽核規則。The following code example uses the method to add an audit rule to a file and uses the method to remove the audit rule from the file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-csharp[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別覆寫屬性和傳回類型，用以代表稽核權限。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent audit rights. 當您使用陣列或包含多個類型的安全性物件的集合時，使用這個屬性來判斷用於每個安全性物件的正確的稽核規則類型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct audit rule type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As FileSystemAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 物件，表示要從檔案或目錄中移除的存取控制清單 (ACL) 使用權限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to remove from a file or directory.

summary.span: 從目前的檔案或目錄中，移除所有相符的允許或拒絕存取控制清單 (ACL) 使用權限。

span.span: Removes all matching allow or deny access control list (ACL) permissions from the current file or directory.

returns.span: 如果移除了存取規則，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the access rule was removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除所有符合存取規則或比對所有從目前的存取規則物件。The method removes either all matching access rules or all matching access rules from the current object. 例如，您可以使用這個方法來移除所有存取使用者的規則，藉由傳遞使用建立物件值，值和使用者帳戶。For example, you can use this method to remove all access rules for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 當您這樣做時，方法會移除任何指定的拒絕規則值或值。When you do this, the method removes any deny rules that specify the value or the value. 若要保存至檔案的新增或變更的存取控制清單 (ACL) 資訊，請使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到目錄，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要從檔案擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要從目錄擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 當您新增存取規則未設定旗標，旗標將會自動加入至您的規則。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果您移除規則稍後但未指定旗標，此旗標將會自動移除。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用類別來新增，並從檔案中移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從目前的檔案或目錄中，移除指定之使用者的所有存取控制清單 (ACL) 使用權限。

span.span: Removes all access control list (ACL) permissions for the specified user from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除所有存取控制清單 (ACL) 權限指定的使用者。The method removes all access control list (ACL) permissions for the specified user. 這個方法會忽略中的所有值以外的使用者帳戶的物件。The method ignores all values in the object except the user account. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到檔案，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到目錄，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要從檔案擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要從目錄擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 當您新增存取規則未設定旗標，旗標將會自動加入至您的規則。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果您移除規則稍後但未指定旗標，此旗標將會自動移除。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed.

span.span: The parameter is .

param.name: rule

span.span: A object that specifies a user whose access control list (ACL) permissions should be removed from a file or directory.

summary.span: 從目前的檔案或目錄中，移除相符的單一允許或拒絕存取控制清單 (ACL) 使用權限。

span.span: Removes a single matching allow or deny access control list (ACL) permission from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除指定存取規則，或指定的比對從目前的存取規則物件。The method removes the specified access rule or the specified matching access rule from the current object. 例如，您可以使用這個方法，若要移除指定藉由傳遞使用者的存取規則使用建立物件值值和使用者帳戶。For example, you can use this method to remove a specified access rule for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 當您這樣做時，方法會移除僅拒絕規則，以指定值。When you do this, the method removes only the deny rule that specifies the value. 它不會移除任何指定的拒絕規則值。It does not remove any deny rules that specify the value. 若要保存至檔案的新增或變更的存取控制清單 (ACL) 資訊，請使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到目錄，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要從檔案擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要從目錄擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 當您新增存取規則未設定旗標，旗標將會自動加入至您的規則。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果您移除規則稍後但未指定旗標，此旗標將會自動移除。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAuditRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAuditRule (rule As FileSystemAuditRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 物件，表示要從檔案或目錄中移除的稽核規則。

span.span: A object that represents an audit rule to remove from a file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除所有符合稽核規則或比對所有稽核規則從目前物件。The method removes either all matching audit rules or all matching audit rules from the current object. 例如，您可以使用這個方法來移除所有稽核規則的使用者藉由傳遞使用建立物件值，值和使用者帳戶。For example, you can use this method to remove all audit rules for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 當您這樣做時，方法會移除任何指定的拒絕規則值或值。When you do this, the method removes any deny rules that specify the value or the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，將稽核規則加入至檔案，以及使用方法來移除檔案中的稽核規則。The following code example uses the method to add an audit rule to a file and uses the method to remove the audit rule from the file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中移除指定之使用者的所有稽核規則。The method removes all audit rules for the specified user. 它會忽略中的所有值以外的使用者帳戶的物件。It ignores all values in the object except the user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中移除指定的比對稽核規則，或指定的比對從目前的稽核規則物件。The method removes the specified matching audit rule or the specified matching audit rule from the current object. 例如，您可以使用這個方法，若要移除指定藉由傳遞使用者的稽核規則使用建立物件值值和使用者帳戶。For example, you can use this method to remove a specified audit rule for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 當您這樣做時，方法會移除僅拒絕規則，以指定值。When you do this, the method removes only a deny rule that specifies the value. 它不會移除任何指定的拒絕規則值。It does not remove any deny rules that specify the value.

param.name: rule
param.span: 物件，表示要加入至檔案或目錄的存取控制清單 (ACL) 使用權限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to add to a file or directory.

summary.span: 將指定的存取控制清單 (ACL) 使用權限加入至目前的檔案或目錄，並移除所有相符的 ACL 使用權限。

span.span: Adds the specified access control list (ACL) permission to the current file or directory and removes all matching ACL permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法新增指定的存取控制清單 (ACL) 規則，或覆寫的比對任何相同 ACL 規則`rule`參數。The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`參數會指定值和方法找到相同的 ACL 規則，以指定值完全相同的規則就會覆寫。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法找到相同的 ACL 規則，以指定值完全相同的規則也會覆寫。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will also be overwritten. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到檔案，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到目錄，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要從檔案擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要從目錄擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method.

span.span: Sets the specified access control list (ACL) permission for the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法新增指定的存取控制清單 (ACL) 規則，或覆寫的比對任何相同 ACL 規則值`rule`參數。The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`參數會指定值和方法找到相同的 ACL 規則，以指定值完全相同的規則就會覆寫。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法找到相同的 ACL 規則，以指定值完全相同的規則就不會覆寫。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到檔案，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要新增或變更 ACL 將資訊保存到目錄，使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要從檔案擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要從目錄擷取 ACL 資訊，請使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法新增指定的稽核規則，或覆寫比對任何相同的稽核規則值`rule`參數。The method adds the specified audit rule or overwrites any identical audit rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`參數會指定值和方法會尋找指定的完全相同的稽核規則值完全相同的規則就會覆寫。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法會尋找指定的完全相同的稽核規則值完全相同的規則就不會覆寫。If the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.
